title: Hm.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/64c864f9956e8f0a75bc84071da60053.png

I vastly enjoyed getting 100/0'd by this champ with 0 counterplay.

replies.body: Overloaded champ, has too much of everything.

I know them feels man!

it'd be okay, if his abilities actually had cast animation times, literally everything he does happens _instantly_ when you press the button.
Unlike so many champs who cant do things anywhere near as quickly because their abilities have animations...

So he Q's you, and then is instantly behind you with W and ulting you back, before you can even do anything.

I hate him so much :/

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iKZ7fXU7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-22T09:59:09.964+0000)
>
> I know them feels man!
> 
> it'd be okay, if his abilities actually had cast animation times, literally everything he does happens _instantly_ when you press the button.
> Unlike so many champs who cant do things anywhere near as quickly because their abilities have animations...
> 
> So he Q's you, and then is instantly behind you with W and ulting you back, before you can even do anything.
> 
> I hate him so much :/

It doesn't help that his Q is prone to teleporting to you if you use a mobility skill 0.1s to soon. By the time you can flash his second Q, his crippling strike ahs already hit you.

Such BS!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s0Nrz4fekIU

Made 10 months ago...
no fix. 

Not even flashing early either, flashing on time.

who only has 1200hp? at I'm assuming somewhere around lvl14 since it's a support lee sin who has 3 full items. I mean I guess if you're an adc you'd only have around 1550hp at lvl14 assuming you started doran's blade.

Anyway I look at, it looks highly probably you had no armour or scaling hp in your rune page, and you build full glass cannon and the lee sin got super fed.

Also the counterplay is dodging the q. It's hard, more often than not, I'll fail to dodge it, but it's not a superfast skillshot so if you aren't bad like I am, there is counterplay.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iKZ7fXU7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-22T10:08:07.885+0000)
>
> who only has 1200hp? at I'm assuming somewhere around lvl14 since it's a support lee sin who has 3 full items. I mean I guess if you're an adc you'd only have around 1550hp at lvl14 assuming you started doran's blade.
> 
> Anyway I look at, it looks highly probably you had no armour or scaling hp in your rune page, and you build full glass cannon and the lee sin got super fed.
> 
> Also the counterplay is dodging the q. It's hard, more often than not, I'll fail to dodge it, but it's not a superfast skillshot so if you aren't bad like I am, there is counterplay.

I was Lux and I was equal in items (give or take) and was one level lower. He survived my entire combo with HP to spare and then ward jumped, ulted me and then kicked me. There was literally nothing I could have done.
